projects.category: 📝 Write and read for all to see!
projects.title: mvp_forums
projects.description: mvp_forums simulates interactive forums using ASP.NET Core and React, encompassing boards, posts, and discussions. It features JSON Web Token authentication, Azure hosting, and PostgreSQL with Entity Framework. The project yielded insights into full-stack development, authentication implementation, and database management.

image.alt: mvp_forums homepage as an authenticated user

projects.title: Stonks Exchange
projects.description: At the Stonk Exchange, you can practice buying and selling real-world stocks with imaginary money. This eliminates the risk of losing you're real money while you get more comfortable with the idea of trading stocks. This application is built with PostgreSQL, Express, React, and Node, as well as Finnhub API and the Financial Modeling Prep API

projects.category: ü¶ú Get those Tweets. Or is it X's?
projects.title: Twitter X
projects.description: By interfacing with Twitter's (X's) API, you can search for tweets (Xs) on any given topic you choose. Alternatively, by clicking on one of five curated user accounts, you can get one of the last ten posts made by the given user at random. This applications was designed and developed as an ASP.NET Core application using React.js.

projects.title: Undertale Hangman
projects.description: Styled after the hit indie-game Undertale, this game of hangman provides a charming and robust experience. Users can either use their keyboard to type in a guess, or enable the optional onscreen keyboard instead. Much like a certain someone's puzzles, it may not be too complicated, but it is quite enjoyable nonetheless.
